entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -43.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 09:42 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -43.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -62
Dewpoint: -47.3°C
Wind: N 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 41. Wind chill near minus 60. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 65 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
